17 class ObjectDetector:
18  def __init__(self, obj_type, obj_color, workspace_ratio=1.0, ret_image_bool=False):
19  self._img = None
20  self._im_thresh = None
21 
22  self._obj_type = obj_type
23  self._nb_sides = obj_type.value
24  self._obj_color = obj_color
25  self._ret_image_bool = ret_image_bool
26 
27  self._workspace_ratio = workspace_ratio
28 
29  self._p_init = None
30  self._draw_method = 2
31 
32  self._draw_marker_size = 0
33  self._draw_marker_thickness = 0
34  self._draw_text_thickness = 0
35 
36  def actualize_img(self, img):
37  # Setting the new image
38  self._img = img
39  # Adjusting drawing values to fit the image size. These values are totally empirical
40  h, w = img.shape[:2]
41  self._draw_marker_size = 9 if w > 499 else 4
42  self._draw_marker_thickness = 5 if w > 499 else 3
43 
44  self._draw_text_thickness = 2 if w > 499 else 1
45 
46  def get_img(self):
47  return self._img
48 
49  def actualize_im_thresh(self, im_thresh):
50  self._im_thresh = im_thresh
51 
52  def get_im_thresh(self):
53  return self._im_thresh
54 
55  def get_hsv_parameters(self):
56  list_min_hsv, list_max_hsv, reverse_hue = self._obj_color.value
57  return list_min_hsv, list_max_hsv, reverse_hue
58 
59  def should_ret_image(self):
60  return self._ret_image_bool
61 
62  def set_nb_sides(self, nb_sides):
63  self._nb_sides = nb_sides
64 
65  def extract_object_with_hsv(self, img):
66  """
67  Execute object detection pipeline using parameters written in object_detector
68  :param img: OpenCV image from Webcam Stream
69  :param self: ObjectDetector object
70  :return: status, ROS message of type ObjectPose, annotated image if give_image is True else None
71  """
72  # Init values
73  msg_res_pos = ObjectPose()
74 
75  # Extract working area image from markers
76  im_work = extract_img_workspace(img, workspace_ratio=self._workspace_ratio)
77  if im_work is None: # Case where working area is not found
78  status = CommandStatus.MARKERS_NOT_FOUND
79  rospy.logwarn("Vision Node - Markers Not Found !")
80  return status, msg_res_pos, "", "", img
81 
82  # Generating threshold image with HSV
83  im_thresh = self.image_preprocess_with_hsv(im_work, use_s_prime=False)
84 
85  # Extracting biggest blob from image. This will correspond to the object
86  cx, cy, angle, obj_type, obj_color, im_draw = self.extract_biggest_blob(im_thresh)
87 
88  if cx is None:
89  rospy.logwarn("Vision Node - No Object Found !")
90  status = CommandStatus.OBJECT_NOT_FOUND
91  else:
92  x_rel, y_rel = self.relative_pos_from_pixels(cx, cy)
93  # Filling message
94  msg_res_pos.x = x_rel
95  msg_res_pos.y = y_rel
96  msg_res_pos.yaw = angle
97 
98  status = CommandStatus.SUCCESS
99 
100  if self.should_ret_image() and status == CommandStatus.SUCCESS:
101  # im_draw = cv2.resize(im_draw, dsize=(450, 450))
102  list_pos = [msg_res_pos.x, msg_res_pos.y, msg_res_pos.z]
103  im_draw = get_annotated_image_rel_pos(im_draw, list_pos, angle)
104 
105  return status, msg_res_pos, obj_type, obj_color, im_draw
106 
107  def extract_all_object_with_hsv(self, img, workspace):
108  """
109  Execute object detection pipeline using parameters written in object_detector
110  :param img: OpenCV image from Webcam Stream
111  :param self: ObjectDetector object
112  :param workspace: dict of the workspace which contains name, matrix, ratio
113  :return: status, list_cx, list_cy, list_angle, list_object_type, list_color
114  """
115  # Extract working area image from markers
116  im_work = extract_img_workspace(img, workspace_ratio=self._workspace_ratio)
117  if im_work is None: # Case where working area is not found
118  status = CommandStatus.MARKERS_NOT_FOUND
119  return status, None, None, None, None, None, None
120 
121  # Generating threshold image with HSV
122  im_thresh = self.image_preprocess_with_hsv(im_work, use_s_prime=False)
123 
124  # Extracting all blob from image. This will correspond to all objects
125  cx_list, cy_list, list_size, angle_list, color_list, object_type_list = self.extract_all_blob(im_thresh,
126  workspace)
127 
128  if cx_list is None:
129  rospy.logwarn("Vision Node - No Object Found !")
130  status = CommandStatus.OBJECT_NOT_FOUND
131  cx_rel_list, cy_rel_list = None, None
132  else:
133  cx_rel_list, cy_rel_list = [], []
134  for cx, cy in zip(cx_list, cy_list):
135  x_rel, y_rel = self.relative_pos_from_pixels(cx, cy)
136  cx_rel_list.append(x_rel)
137  cy_rel_list.append(y_rel)
138 
139  status = CommandStatus.SUCCESS
140 
141  return status, cx_rel_list, cy_rel_list, list_size, angle_list, color_list, object_type_list
142 
143  def image_preprocess_with_hsv(self, im_work, use_s_prime=False):
144  """
145 
146  :param im_work:
147  :param use_s_prime: Bool -> True if you want to use S channel as S' = S x V else classic
148  :return:
149  """
150  self.actualize_img(im_work)
151  im_thresh = threshold_hsv(im_work, self._obj_color)
152  im_morph = morphological_transformations(im_thresh, MorphoType.OPEN, kernel_shape=(7, 7))
153  self.actualize_im_thresh(im_morph)
154  return im_morph
155 
156  def relative_pos_from_pixels(self, x_pixels, y_pixels):
157  return float(x_pixels) / self._img.shape[1], float(y_pixels) / self._img.shape[0]
158 
159  def extract_biggest_blob(self, im_thresh):
160  """
161  Function to extract the biggest shape from a threshed image.
162  :return: X,Y coordinates of the center / Rotation angle / IM
163 
164  Multiple drawing methods:
165  - 1 : Draw on Threshold image
166  - 2 : Draw on BGR
167  - 3 : Draw on BGR with mask
168  """
169  cx, cy = None, None
170  angle = 0
171  found_something = False
172 
173  if not self._ret_image_bool or self._draw_method == 2:
174  im_ret = self._img
175  thickness_contours = 3
176  elif self._draw_method == 3:
177  im_ret = cv2.bitwise_and(self._img, self._img, mask=self._im_thresh)
178  thickness_contours = 2
179  else:
180  im_ret = cv2.cvtColor(self._im_thresh, cv2.COLOR_GRAY2BGR)
181  thickness_contours = 2
182 
183  best_cnts = biggest_contours_finder(im_thresh)
184  if best_cnts is None:
185  return None, None, None, "", "", im_ret
186  best_cnt = None
187  obj_type = ObjectType.ANY
188 
189  for best_cnt in best_cnts:
190  cx, cy = get_contour_barycenter(best_cnt)
191  if self._nb_sides is not None:
192  peri = cv2.arcLength(best_cnt, True)
193  approx = cv2.approxPolyDP(best_cnt, 0.035 * peri, True)
194 
195  # ANY CASE
196  if self._obj_type == ObjectType.ANY:
197  if len(approx) >= 5:
198  obj_type = ObjectType.CIRCLE
199  else:
200  obj_type = ObjectType.SQUARE
201  angle = get_contour_angle(best_cnt)
202 
203  found_something = True
204  break
205  else:
206  obj_type = self._obj_type
207  # Circle Case
208  if self._obj_type == ObjectType.CIRCLE and len(approx) >= 5:
209  found_something = True
210  break
211 
212  elif len(approx) == self._nb_sides:
213  angle = get_contour_angle(best_cnt)
214  found_something = True
215  break
216  if not found_something:
217  return None, None, None, "", "", im_ret
218 
219  # Getting color
220  colors_representation = np.mean(self._img[cy - 3:cy + 3, cx - 3:cx + 3], axis=(0, 1))
221  most_present_channel = np.argmax(colors_representation)
222 
223  obj_color = ["BLUE", "GREEN", "RED"][most_present_channel]
224 
225  if self._ret_image_bool and cx is not None:
226  p_init = self._p_init
227  if p_init is None:
228  h_im, w_im = im_ret.shape[:2]
229  p_init = (w_im // 2, h_im // 2)
230  cv2.drawContours(im_ret, [best_cnt], 0, PURPLE, thickness_contours)
231  cv2.arrowedLine(im_ret, p_init, (cx, cy), BLUE, thickness=self._draw_text_thickness)
232 
233  cv2.drawMarker(im_ret, p_init, markerType=cv2.MARKER_DIAMOND,
234  markerSize=self._draw_marker_size, thickness=self._draw_marker_thickness, color=RED)
235  cv2.drawMarker(im_ret, (cx, cy), markerType=cv2.MARKER_TILTED_CROSS,
236  markerSize=self._draw_marker_size, thickness=self._draw_marker_thickness, color=ORANGE)
237 
238  return cx, cy, angle, obj_type.name, obj_color, im_ret
239 
240  def extract_all_blob(self, im_thresh, workspace):
241  """
242  Function to extract all shape from a threshed image.
243  :return: X,Y coordinates of the center / Rotation angle / IM
244 
245  Multiple drawing methods:
246  - 1 : Draw on Threshold image
247  - 2 : Draw on BGR
248  - 3 : Draw on BGR with mask
249  """
250  cx_list, cy_list = [], []
251  angle_list = []
252  color_list, object_type_list = [], []
253  list_size = []
254  found_something = False
255 
256  best_cnts = biggest_contours_finder(im_thresh, 20)
257  if best_cnts is None:
258  return None, None, None, None, None, None
259  obj_type = ObjectType.ANY
260  angle = 0
261 
262  for best_cnt in best_cnts:
263  cx, cy = get_contour_barycenter(best_cnt)
264  cx_list.append(cx)
265  cy_list.append(cy)
266  if self._nb_sides is not None:
267  peri = cv2.arcLength(best_cnt, True)
268  approx = cv2.approxPolyDP(best_cnt, 0.035 * peri, True)
269 
270  if len(approx) == 4:
271  obj_type = ObjectType.SQUARE
272  angle = get_contour_angle(best_cnt)
273 
274  pt_0 = self.relative_pos_from_pixels(*approx[0][0])
275  pt_1 = self.relative_pos_from_pixels(*approx[1][0])
276  pt_2 = self.relative_pos_from_pixels(*approx[2][0])
277  position_0, _ = get_pose(workspace, pt_0[0], pt_0[1], angle)
278  position_1, _ = get_pose(workspace, pt_1[0], pt_1[1], angle)
279  position_2, _ = get_pose(workspace, pt_2[0], pt_2[1], angle)
280 
281  size_x = euclidean_dist_2_pts([position_0[0], position_0[1]], [position_1[0], position_1[1]])
282  size_y = euclidean_dist_2_pts([position_1[0], position_1[1]], [position_2[0], position_2[1]])
283  list_size.append([size_x, size_y])
284 
285  else:
286  obj_type = ObjectType.CIRCLE
287  pt_o = self.relative_pos_from_pixels(cx, cy)
288  pt_x = self.relative_pos_from_pixels(*approx[0][0])
289 
290  position_o, _ = get_pose(workspace, pt_o[0], pt_o[1], angle)
291  position_x, _ = get_pose(workspace, pt_x[0], pt_x[1], angle)
292 
293  radius = euclidean_dist_2_pts([position_o[0], position_o[1]], [position_x[0], position_x[1]])
294  list_size.append([radius * 2])
295 
296  object_type_list.append(obj_type)
297  angle_list.append(angle)
298 
299  found_something = True
300 
301  # Getting color
302  colors_representation = np.mean(self._img[cy - 3:cy + 3, cx - 3:cx + 3], axis=(0, 1))
303  most_present_channel = np.argmax(colors_representation)
304 
305  obj_color = ["BLUE", "GREEN", "RED"][most_present_channel]
306 
307  color_list.append(obj_color)
308 
309  if not found_something:
310  return None, None, None, None, None, None
311  else:
312  return cx_list, cy_list, list_size, angle_list, color_list, object_type_list
313 
314 
315 def get_annotated_image_rel_pos(img, list_pos, angle, write_on_top=True):
316  """
317  Annotate image with position information
318  :param img: Image
319  :param list_pos: List of position [x,y,z]
320  :param angle: the angle
321  :param write_on_top: if text should be write on top
322  :return: annotated image
323  """
324  x, y, _ = list_pos
325  # print(x,y,z,angle)
326  if x is None or x == "None":
327  return img
328  text = "x:{:.1f}% y:{:.1f}% Roll {:.1f}".format(100 * x, 100 * y,
329  angle)
330  return add_annotation_to_image(img, text, write_on_top=write_on_top)
